section.name: Download
section.p: opendbcopy requires a Java Runtime Environment 1.3 or higher to be installed. If you do not have Java installed please download it first here.

subsection.name: Binaries
subsection.p:
opendbcopy binaries are distributed as installable jar using IzPack
After download here you can directly launch the opendbcopy setup wizard with:
java -jar opendbcopy-xx.jar (replace xx with current version)
You are then guided through the installation process. Windows users can create Shortcuts for their desktop and Start Menu.
Please ensure that you have the required JDBC database drivers ready for your migration project. For details see the user manual.

subsection.name: Sources
subsection.p: latest opendbcopy sources can be checked out from the CVS source repository or released sources here.
